headline: Citi puts News Corp on positive catalyst watch on ahead of trust ruling
summary: Investing.com -- Citi maintained its "Buy" rating on News Corp (NASDAQ:NWSA), with a $36 price target, as it opened a positive catalyst watch ahead of a potential ruling in the Murdoch family trust case in Nevada court.“We maintain our Buy rating as we continue to see upside if the firm spins REA,” analyst said.

headline: 3 Film & Television Production Stocks to Buy on Solid Industry Trends
summary: Film and television production and distribution companies like LYV, NWSA and TKO are thriving due to the heightened consumption of digital entertainment and a revitalized advertising spending climate.
